Title: Reclassifies court officers and court clerks of the unified court system under the definition of police officer; repealer
Summary: Reclassifies court officers and court clerks of the unified court system under the definition of police officer.
LawCode: Amd §1.20, rpld §2.10 sub 21 ¶¶a & b, CP L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to reclassifying court officers and court clerks of the unified court system under the definition of police officer; and to repeal certain provisions of such law relating thereto
